dt: {bc}a place usually away from urban areas where tents or simple buildings (such as cabins) are erected for shelter or for temporary residence (as for laborers, prisoners, or vacationers)
{bc}a group of tents, cabins, or huts
{bc}a settlement newly sprung up in a lumbering or mining region
{bc}a place usually in the country for recreation or instruction often during the summer
{bc}a program offering access to recreational or educational facilities for a limited period of time

dt.t: a resort offering boating and hiking {wi}camps{/wi}
the star pitcher injured in {wi}camp{/wi} this spring

dt: {bc}a group engaged in promoting or defending a theory, doctrine, position, or person

et: Middle French, probably from Middle French dialect (Picard) or Old Occitan, from Latin {it}campus{/it} plain, field
shortdef: a place usually away from urban areas where tents or simple buildings (such as cabins) are erected for shelter or for temporary residence (as for laborers, prisoners, or vacationers)
a group of tents, cabins, or huts
a settlement newly sprung up in a lumbering or mining region

dt: {bc}to make camp or occupy a camp
{bc}to live temporarily in a camp or outdoors

dt.t: {wi}camp{/wi} out in the library for the afternoon

shortdef: to make camp or occupy a camp
to live temporarily in a camp or outdoors —often used with out
to take up one's quarters : lodge

dt: {bc}something so outrageously artificial, affected, inappropriate, or out-of-date as to be considered amusing

dt.t: This version of the play is {wi}camp{/wi}: outrageous in concept and wild in its execution with double entendres flying every which way.

dt: {bc}a style or mode of personal or creative expression that is absurdly exaggerated and often fuses elements of high and popular culture
{bc}exaggerated effeminate mannerisms (as of speech or gesture)

shortdef: something so outrageously artificial, affected, inappropriate, or out-of-date as to be considered amusing
a style or mode of personal or creative expression that is absurdly exaggerated and often fuses elements of high and popular culture
exaggerated effeminate mannerisms (as of speech or gesture)

dt.t: {wi}camp{/wi} send-ups of the songs of the fifties and sixties

shortdef: of, relating to, being, or displaying camp : campy

dt: {bc}to engage in camp {bc}exhibit the qualities of camp

dt.t: he … was {wi}camping{/wi}, hands on hips, with a quick eye to notice every man who passed by

shortdef: to engage in camp : exhibit the qualities of camp

dt: {bc}a girl who is a member of a national organization of young people from ages 5 to 18

et: from {it}Camp Fire Girls{/it}, Inc., former name of Camp Fire, Inc.
shortdef: a girl who is a member of a national organization of young people from ages 5 to 18

dt: {bc}a civilian (such as a prostitute) who follows a military unit to attend or exploit military personnel
{bc}a disciple or follower who is not of the main body of members or adherents
{bc}a politician who joins the party or movement solely for personal gain

shortdef: a civilian (such as a prostitute) who follows a military unit to attend or exploit military personnel
a disciple or follower who is not of the main body of members or adherents; especially : a politician who joins the party or movement solely for personal gain

dt: {bc}a series of evangelistic meetings usually held outdoors and attended by persons who often camp nearby

shortdef: a series of evangelistic meetings usually held outdoors and attended by persons who often camp nearby

dt: {bc}a usually short-sleeved shirt having a notched collar and often patch pockets

shortdef: a usually short-sleeved shirt having a notched collar and often patch pockets
